author: Pat McGarry
description: A very simple cocktail, but when made with freshly squeezed oranges straight from the refrigerator this is a great brunch drink. (Be sure to fine strain your orange juice.)
name: Buck's Fizz
recipeIngredient: 100 ml Brut champagne or sparkling wine (chilled)

recipeInstructions.text: POUR half the champagne into a chilled glass, then the orange juice and finally the rest of the champagne
